Technique: BURNED, OXIDIZED; FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; ENGOBE; PAINTED
Name: Vase
Description: Ovoidal receptacle with narrow mouth, rounded rim, neck with straight walls and unstable base. Paste of a dark reddish colour and surface with coating, also reddish. It has a painted decoration at the lower part of the neck in dark wine-red, consisting of crescent moons, framed by two lines of the same colour.
